content: H4L1 (0.0450 g, 0.14 mmol) and LaCl3·7H2O (0.0531 g, 0.14 mmol) were suspended in water (6 mL). A 2.6 M solution of HNO3 in H2O (1.5 mL), and a 0.3 M solution of piperazine in H2O (1.5 mL) were added to the mixture in a PARR pressure vessel. The vessel was sealed, heated in an oven at 210 °C for 72 h and cooled to room temperature. The crystalline white powder obtained was washed with DMF and water to remove nonreacted ligand, and then with acetone. Yield: 0.05 g (0.11 mmol), 79%. Elemental analysis (%): Anal. Calc. for C12H9O6P2La: C 32.03, H 2.02, N 0.00; found: C 32.12, H 1.99, N 0.00. FTIR: ν (cm–1) = 3070 (w), 2358 (w), 1917 (w), 1604 (w), 1541 (w), 1482 (w), 1312 (m), 1138 (s), 1113 (s), 1055 (m), 968 (s), 807 (s), 720 (s), 703 (s), 645 (w), 629 (w). 1H MAS NMR (600 MHz) δ ppm: 7.40 (s, 8H, Ar–H), 18.56 (w, 1H, O–H). 31P­{1H} MAS NMR (600 MHz) δ ppm: 10.67.
clean_text:
Synthesis of [La(C12H8P2O6H)], MFM-550(La)

H4L1 (0.0450 g, 0.14 mmol) and LaCl3⋅7H2O (0.0531 g, 0.14 mmol) were suspended in water (6 mL). A 2.6 M solution of HNO3 in H2O (1.5 mL), and a 0.3 M solution of piperazine in H2O (1.5 mL) were added to the mixture in a PARR pressure vessel. The vessel was sealed, heated in an oven at 210 °C for 72 h and cooled to room temperature. The crystalline white powder obtained was washed with DMF and water to remove nonreacted ligand, and then with acetone. Yield: 0.05 g (0.11 mmol), 79%. Elemental analysis (%): Anal. Calc. for C12H9O6P2La: C 32.03, H 2.02, N 0.00; found: C 32.12, H 1.99, N 0.00. FTIR: ν (cm-1) = 3070 (w), 2358 (w), 1917 (w), 1604 (w), 1541 (w), 1482 (w), 1312 (m), 1138 (s), 1113 (s), 1055 (m), 968 (s), 807 (s), 720 (s), 703 (s), 645 (w), 629 (w). 1H MAS NMR (600 MHz) δ ppm: 7.40 (s, 8H, Ar-H), 18.56 (w, 1H, O-H). 31P{1H} MAS NMR (600 MHz) δ ppm: 10.67.
